entry.title: Topics in statistics and experimental design

link.title: Topics in statistics and experimental design

entry.content:
This is a list of statistical methods and thoughts on experimental design that I’d like to write up. I intend to work through examples in Jupyter notebook, using data from my own experiments.

Cochlear cultures hair cell counts

   - Experimental design and quantification
   - Statistical power and power analysis
   - Descriptive statistics
   - Hypothesis testing
   - Detection of outliers

Zebrafish lateral line hair cell counts

   - Experimental design and quantification
   - Statistical power and power analysis
   - Dose-response curve analysis

Hair cell imaging

   - Labels and cell death
   - Live imaging

Gene expression in mouse branchial arch tissue

   - Statistical power and power analysis
   - Hypothesis testing

Landmark-based morphometrics

   - Statistical power and power analysis
   - PCA
entry.summary: This is a list of statistical methods and thoughts on experimental design that I’d like to write up. I intend to work through examples in Jupyter notebook, using data from my own experiments. Cochlear cultures hair cell counts - Experimental design and quantification - Statistical power and power analysis - Descriptive statistics - Hypothesis testing - Detection of outliers Zebrafish lateral line hair cell counts - Experimental design and quantification - Statistical power and power analysis - Dose-response curve analysis Hair cell imaging - Labels and cell death - Live imaging Gene expression in mouse branchial arch tissue - Statistical power and power analysis - Hypothesis testing Landmark-based morphometrics - Statistical power and power analysis - PCA
